values:
In no particular order:
I am Ryan- Son of Rex (Richard), the king!
I am a gentleman and a scholar!
I am THE Prom King!
I am an American.
I am a New Englanda'.
I am a member of A-Town.
I am a romantic and an idealist.
I am a Star Wars fanatic!
I am an armchair historian.
I am a tactical genius.
I am an NCO at heart.
I am generous and kind, unless you piss me off!
I am a girl's best friend, never her boyfriend.
I am a believer.
I am a, daily, a student and a teacher.
I am a sinner.
I am an ADDer (whatever the hell that is).
I am lonely.
I am alone.
I am surrounded by good friends.
I am cold.
I am a slacker.
I am a procrastinator.
I am fallible (We all would do well to remember this more often, including me, and including the Pope).
I am poetic.
I am inarticulate.
I am a Libra.
I am a patriot.
I am a dissenter.
I am a protestor.
I am a Protestant.
I am a Congregationalist.
I am tired.
I am procrastinating.
I am medicated.
I am free.
I am a Bringhurst!
I am a creation of God.
I am a product of development.
I am human.
I am.

I am, and that is enough! :-D

Well,right now Adam and Cat are hanging out on Adam's bed and for some reason it's bothering me, I don't really know why. That's all, over and out.

<--Ry Guy-->

I just saw the movie Hitch: The Cure for the Common Man . It was amazing. I loved it. It's definitely in my top ten, possibly my top three favorite movies. It was not only funny and entertaining but challenging as well, but that was just personally for me. But anyway, that's the point of this entry, I love the movie Hitch!!! <--Ry Guy-->

Why's love so complicated? It's really a simple concept, you care for someone more than you care for yourself, you put another before yourself. How did we make it so complicated? WHy can't I just love somone and leave it at that, nothing else, no other feelings or emotions? Also, why isn't that satisfying? I hate human nature! (Actually I don't, I rather think it's a good thing, but right now I hate it) See I basically know all the answers to the aforementioned, except how we complicated the concept of love so much, that I can't get my mind around.

Plus, I've been in kinda a sad spot since Anna's party/secret santa it was an ok party, but it just got kinda depressing and then I kinda just sat there thinking, and I did what I usually do when I get that way, I thought of every single one of my insecurities and regrets and painful memories. It was nearly hell for 30 mintues, and then Anna kinda cracked my shell, she wouldn't leave me alone til I told her what was wrong, and I wasn't as sad for the rest of the night, so thanx go out to Anna.

Oh, and finally, I miss my friends, I didn't see many of them today, and it made me sad. :'-(

<--Ry Guy-->

This is totally me. :-D
Werewolves of folklore differ greatly from modern
renditions seen in movies and shows. People
believed there were many ways to become
werewolves, such as drinking rainwater
collected in a wolf's pawprint, eating meat
gnawed on by a wolf, or being born with a full
set of teeth or covered in a caul. And unlike
movie werewolves, werewolves of old were
oftentimes harmless and highly honorable! As a werewolf, you are loyal, strong and honorable,
and you will protect all you hold dear with
your very life. Although you are not a violent
individual at heart, you will fight for what
you believe in. You are a good friend and truly
are a wonderful person to be around.

Who is your inner Shapeshifter?
brought to you by Quizilla <--Ry Guy-->

The Steelers Suck The Steelers suck Yankee dick! George Bush is a horrible president and should not be re-elected. In all honesty John Kerry isn't a much better option for president, but at least if he's elected, Bush won't be president. I hate Rush Limbaugh. Adam listens to him incessently. Adam is really pissing me off right now. Flaming Liberal, Flaming Liberal, Flaming Liberal....blah blah blah blah blah I never said I was a flaming liberal and why are liberals flaming? huh? A vote for Kerry is a vote for Bin Laden, is Rush a fucking idiot?! I am not going to vote for Bin Laden!!! this fucker is trying to tell me who I'm gonna vote for?!!! What a fucka!!!! I would never "vote" for Bin Laden he is a mass murderer of American people. I will vote for Kerry and not really because I like Kerry but because I can't imagine living under "King George" for another 4 years. This brings me to another point. The electoral college is a mess. It must be removed!! Why should I vote if I'm not in a "swing state"? why should one state's votes count more than another's? This devalues the votes of people who live in "non-swing" states. And I have to say I am in favor of stem cell research. I think that discarded and nonliving embryos should most certainly be used to help living people. I'm sick of listening to people whine about the rights of unborn children. Half the time they're refering to fucking embryos. How bout the rights of living people. that's one thing I hated about the catholic doctrine we went over in morality class, "the" Church holds the position that the unborn child's life is more important than the mother's. Now that's fucked up! Iraq, Afghanistan, and the war on terror is not the only issue in this election. Rush doesn't seem to get that. Whatever, I'm done ranting for now. <--Ry Guy--> And yes I am voting for Kerry tomorrow!

So, I'm at Emmanuel. Moved in and all. Been very busy over the past two days with Peer Advisor meetings and stuff. I'm not thinking about Emily as much anymore, but I still think about her alot.
